args.pattern: after a very long period has passed

value.pattern: after a very long period has passed
value.resultPattern: \bafter a very long period has passed

an7.66:3.2.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassati.
an7.66:3.2.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the rain doesn’t fall. For many years, many hundreds, many thousands, many hundreds of thousands of years no rain falls.

an7.66:4.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:4.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a second sun appears.

an7.66:5.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:5.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a third sun appears.

an7.66:6.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:6.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a fourth sun appears.

an7.66:7.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:7.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a fifth sun appears.

an7.66:8.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:8.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a sixth sun appears.

an7.66:9.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati.
an7.66:9.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, a seventh sun appears.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 7
7. The Great Chapter
66. The Seven Suns

mn130:18.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa puratthimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati.
mn130:18.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the eastern gate of the Great Hell is opened.

mn130:18.6.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa pacchimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati …pe…
mn130:18.6.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the western gate …

mn130:19.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena tassa mahānirayassa puratthimaṁ dvāraṁ apāpurīyati.
mn130:19.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, the eastern gate of the Great Hell is opened.

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 130
Messengers of the Gods

dn27:10.1.pli: Hoti kho so, vāseṭṭha, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn27:10.1.en: There comes a time when, Vāseṭṭha, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn27:10.4.pli: Hoti kho so, vāseṭṭha, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn27:10.4.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

dn1:2.2.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo, yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn1:2.2.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn1:2.3.1.pli: Hoti kho so, bhikkhave, samayo, yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn1:2.3.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

mlDocs.title:
Long Discourses 1
The Prime Net
1. Talk on Wanderers

dn24:2.14.11.pli: ‘Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko saṁvaṭṭati.
dn24:2.14.11.en: ‘There comes a time when, reverends, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos contracts.

dn24:2.15.1.pli: Hoti kho so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ kadāci karahaci dīghassa addhuno accayena ayaṁ loko vivaṭṭati.
dn24:2.15.1.en: There comes a time when, after a very long period has passed, this cosmos expands.

1. On Sunakkhatta
